title: Suggestion: Condensed Red Tracker
body:
I would like to suggest that in the red post tracker condense posts from the same thread into one container, and allow it to be expanded to show the Riot posts within.

---
Mock-up of current

RAWR Hamsters - Ghostcrawler
RAWR Hamsters - Baconhawk
RAWR Hamsters - GhostCrawler
Ninjas > Pirates - Ironstylus
Rawr Hamsters - Baconhawk

Mock-up of proposed

RAWR Hamsters (7) - Ghostcrawler, Baconhawk, and ...
Ninjas > Pirates - Ironstylus
Some Random Post (42) - Some Random Rioter(s)
I Can Read More Things! - Some Other Rioter
Much Info, Such Wow -  Tamat

replies.body:
{{champion:33}} Ok. 

Thanks for posting this, a lot of you guys are calling this out and it has been added to our list of things to address. [ More about it here.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/site-feedback/Ycc11N8g-fix-the-red-tracker?comment=0001)
